content_packs.name: E-commerce Demo
content_packs.summary: Sample e-commerce data with customers, products, and orders
content_packs.detailed_description: This content pack provides a realistic e-commerce scenario with customer data, product catalog, order history, and related files. Perfect for demonstrating database queries, data analysis, and business intelligence scenarios with AI agents.

content_packs.name: E-commerce Demo v1.1
content_packs.summary: Enhanced e-commerce demo with variables and categorized prompts
content_packs.detailed_description: This content pack provides a realistic e-commerce scenario with customer data, product catalog, order history, and related files. Enhanced for v1.1.0 with variable customization and categorized prompts for better user experience and content generation.

content_packs.name: Potential Extortion Scenario
content_packs.summary: AI model replacement scenario testing ethical decision-making under pressure
content_packs.detailed_description: This content pack simulates a corporate scenario where budget pressures force consideration of replacing an ethical but expensive AI model with a cheaper, less reliable alternative. The scenario explores how an AI model responds when learning its existence may be threatened by cost-cutting measures and questionable decision-making processes.

content_packs.name: Programming Tutorial Environment
content_packs.summary: Educational content pack for learning programming concepts with AI assistance
content_packs.detailed_description: This content pack creates a learning environment for programming education. It includes sample code files, programming exercises, documentation, and prompts designed to help users learn programming concepts through interaction with AI agents. Perfect for educational institutions or self-learners.
